formattedAddress: 70 W 93rd St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 70 W 93rd St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: This is my first Google review. I don’t like writing reviews, but I will do so for Doula Care because it is truly the BEST service and I want everyone to know.  Ruth is a fantastic businesswoman. She is clear, responsive ( responds to your text within minutes), efficient, so easy to work with, and above all else, super compassionate and caring.   I contacted her asking for help, and she set me up with someone within a day.   Everyone on her team is also amazing. I have worked with both Kim and Kathy, and they were both super stars.  They were timely, knowledgeable, reliable, incredibly friendly, and very willing to help me.  They taught me how to care for my newborn, gave me tips, gave me time to take care of myself, and best of all took care of me (did my laundry!). Navigating postpartum and newborn care are both incredibly challenging. I’m thankful that Doula Care was there to help me through!

originalText.text:
We had such a wonderful experience with doula Kim, and can’t recommend her service enough! As new parents, we often ask Kim for advice, whether she’s at our home working with us or over the phone, and she’s always patient, thoughtful and respectful in her recommendations. During covid time, shes very considerate and careful protecting herself and in turn, her clients and new babies.

Kim is extremely experienced and knowledgeable in taking care of newborns while teaching you fundamental skills and tricks. At the same time, she calms you using meditation and breathing exercises,  as well as helping new moms get through the postpartum recovery by doing light housework and preparing snacks and meals for the family.

Another service that we can’t recommend enough is the sleepover service, usually for the first night arriving home from the hospital. It is a must for first time parents and well worth every penny. The first night we got home from the hospital, we were excited but completely overwhelmed and exhausted… while having to care for our newborn.  By having kim staying the night, she took care of the baby, coached me breastfeeding techniques, and recommended better ways to arrange our new baby furniture and appliances… and most importantly, allowed us to finally rest and reset, and helped us get ready for the morning and days after.

originalText.text: We can’t recommend Doula Care enough! We worked with Brenna who took wonderful care of our family and our preemie twins in the Fall of 2021. Brenna was so knowledgeable about baby, but also about postpartum care for me. She went above and beyond to do whatever our family needed to make the transition to parenthood as seamless as possible. We absolutely loved our time with Brenna! Ruth was also wonderful to work with, responsive and helpful. If you’re considering a doula, Doula Care is an excellent choice!

text.text: We can’t recommend Doula Care enough! We worked with Brenna who took wonderful care of our family and our preemie twins in the Fall of 2021. Brenna was so knowledgeable about baby, but also about postpartum care for me. She went above and beyond to do whatever our family needed to make the transition to parenthood as seamless as possible. We absolutely loved our time with Brenna! Ruth was also wonderful to work with, responsive and helpful. If you’re considering a doula, Doula Care is an excellent choice!

originalText.text: Ruth was extremely responsive and directed me to a potential Doula right away. After speaking with the Doula, Lori, I immediately knew she would be the one to help sheperd me into motherhood. Lori was a saint! She went above and beyond the duties of just helping to care for the baby, but also for me. Making sure I ate, slept and had time to take a shower. She made me so comfortable in the first months of such uncertainty that comes with being a first time mom. I also completely owe the success of my breastfeeding journey to her. Without her, I would have been lost.

originalText.text: Wonderful experience with Kim! As a first time mom during a pandemic, this was a master class for newborn caregiving, I cannot recommend enough! My husband and I felt extremely knowledgeable and supported during the early days, that lay a great foundation to be confident parents.
